Today in County Clare, expect solid surf with 10 ft @ 13s W and fresh 16 mph SSW winds. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, both offering clean conditions during their tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 12 ft @ 13s W with fresh 19 mph W winds, making it poor across the board. Day after, still poor with 6 ft @ 10s W and 22 mph WNW winds. Best: today.
